TopicTitle: Tutorial stuck with overlay from first tutorial

Articles.Content:
Just installed

Through Steam

No mods

Played only tutorials

One game session - not restarted

 

There's an overlay in tutorials, showing me how to pitch (animation showing arrow up and down, S and W)

 

 

 

Restarting the game fixes the issue. Going out of tutorial and back does not fix it.

 

Could have been caused by me having to restart the first controls tutorial, since it did not register that I pitched up again, even though I flew entirely straight up.

Edited February 26, 2023 by ANaflabet
added screenshot + reproduction + fix

Same happened on my end.  I thought it wasn't recognizing the pitch straight up part the first time, so I restarted the tutorial.  This Kerbal is cutely enjoying his rocketship seesaw.

Note: Restarting the client fixed the issue as well.
